contentList.content: Illithid Consequences

You may use your connection to the parasite in your brain in order to force cultists of the Absolute to obey you. However, giving in to further allure of the tadpole will take a toll on your mind.

After having taken a Long Rest, your maximum Hit Points are reduced by 2 for each additional illithid power you have acquired.
Psionic Overload
When dealing damage with a weapon or while unarmed, deal an additional [1].
Favourable Outcomes
Gain a +2 bonus to all <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRolls">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> that you make.
Force Tunnel
Charge forward, pushing all objects and creatures in your path [1] away from you.
Empowered Force Tunnel
Charge forward, dealing damage and pushing all objects and creatures in your path [1] away from you.
Flay Mind
Force a creature to undergo a searing pain which threatens to tear their mind asunder, driving them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MADNESS">Mad</LSTag>.
Empowered Flay Mind

Force a creature to undergo a searing pain which threatens to tear their mind asunder, driving them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MADNESS">Mad</LSTag>. Regain <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> equal to the damage you deal.
Infuse Health
Restore another creatures <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> by the amount that you currently have.
Stage Fright
Force a group of creatures to make <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>. Each time they miss, they will take [1].
Stage Fright

Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and takes [1] each time they miss. This status is removed once the creature successfully lands an attack.
Ability Drain

When you make an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against a non-allied creature, the attack reduces your targets corresponding ability to successfully roll <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Ability Drain: Strength
Affected creature's Strength based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> have been reduced by 1 per stack of <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="TAD_DrainAbility">Ability Drain</LSTag>.
Ability Drain: Dexterity
Affected creature's Dexterity based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> have been reduced by 1 per stack of <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="TAD_DrainAbility">Ability Drain</LSTag>.
Ability Drain: Intelligence
Affected creature's Intelligence based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> have been reduced by 1 per stack of <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="TAD_DrainAbility">Ability Drain</LSTag>.
Ability Drain: Wisdom
Affected creature's Wisdom based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> have been reduced by 1 per stack of <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="TAD_DrainAbility">Ability Drain</LSTag>.
Ability Drain: Charisma
Affected creature's Charisma based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> have been reduced by 1 per stack of <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="TAD_DrainAbility">Ability Drain</LSTag>.
Luck of the Far Realms

Once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>, you may change a successful <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against a foe into a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Luck of the Far Realms
Change a successful <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRolls">Attack Roll</LSTag> into a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Illithid Influence
You may channel the dark allure of the tadpole to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charm</LSTag> an enemy that attacks you, preventing them from attacking you until their next turn.
Illithid Influence
Forcibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charm</LSTag> an enemy that attacks you, preventing them from attacking you until their next turn.
Displace
Creatures suffering falling damage because of your actions take an additional [1].
Displace: Falling Damage
Creatures suffering falling damage because of your actions take an additional [1].
Displace
Creatures suffering falling damage because of the actions of who applied this status take an additional [1].
Repulsor
Push anything and anyone back by [1] with a psionic shockwave.
Cull the Weak
When you bring a creature down to fewer <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> than your number of Illithid Powers, it instantly dies.
Psionic Backlash
When an enemy within [1] casts a spell, you may choose to inflict [2] to the caster multiplied by the level of the Spell cast.
Psionic Backlash
When an enemy within [1] casts a spell, inflict [2] to the caster multiplied by the Spells level cast.
Psionic Backlash
When an enemy within [1] casts a spell, inflict [2] to the caster multiplied by the Spells level cast.
Shield of Thralls

Conjure a volatile shield around yourself or an ally, granting the target 24 <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag>. Upon losing them, the shield bursts, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunning</LSTag> enemies within [1].
Volatile Shield

Affected creature is wreathed in a volitile shield providing <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag>. Upon losing them, the shield bursts, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunning</LSTag> enemies within [1].
Empowered Shield of Thralls

Conjure a volatile shield around yourself or an ally, granting the target +24 <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag>. Upon losing them, the shield bursts, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunning</LSTag> enemies within [1].
Perilous Stakes

Make a creature <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to all damage. If not killed before the status is resolved, the target will immediately restore all of their <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>.
Perilous Stakes

Affected creature is <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to all damage. If not killed before this status is resolved, the creature will immediately restore all of their <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>.
Empowered Perilous Stakes

Make a creature <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to all damage for a longer period of time. If not killed before the status is resolved, the target will immediately restore all of their <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>.
Hivemind

Gain a +2 bonus to your Initiative and <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>. In addition, you gain the ability to see normally in darkness, both magical and non-magical, to a distance of [2].
Fracture Psyche
Invade a creature's mind and disrupt its defences. The creatures <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> is reduced by [1].
If the creature dies while its psyche is fractured, you can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_TAD_Imperil_Recast">Fracture Psyche</LSTag> on another target.
Fractured Psyche
<LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> reduced by [1].
Devour
Upon killing a creature you immediately restore +1d12 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>.
Psionic Dominance

Once per Short Rest, when an enemy within [1] targets you with a Spell, you may immediately nullify it.

Dangerous and Fatal foes cannot have their Spells nullified.
Psionic Dominance

When an enemy within [1] targets you with a Spell, immediately nullify it.

Dangerous and Fatal foes cannot have their Spells nullified.
Black Hole
Create a point of intense gravity that pulls in all nearby enemies and objects.
Empowered Black Hole
Create a point of intense gravity that pulls in all nearby enemies and objects, damaging them.
Levitation
Gain the ability to effortlessly levitate toward destinations of your choosing.
Levitate
Float effortlessly to a destination.
Mind Blast
Spew forth a conical wave of psychic energy, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunning</LSTag> targets within it.
Mind Sanctuary
Sculpt a magical nexus that <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HASTE">Hastens</LSTag> creatures within it.
Mind Sanctuary Aura
Anyone within the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_TAD_MindSanctuary>Mind Sanctuary</LSTag> becomes <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HASTE">Hastened</LSTag>.
Within the Mind Sanctuary
Affected creature can take <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Actions</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Actions</LSTag> interchangeably.
Freecast

Once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>, you may draw power deep from within your Illithid connections, causing your next action to not consume any class based resources or <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slots</LSTag>.
Absorb Intellect
Devour a foe's intellect, worsening their <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> by [1] per turn with a condition that steadily worsens, healing you as it progresses.
Absorbed Intellect
Affected creature's <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> are being reduced by [1].
Empowered Absorb Intellect

Devour your foe's entirety, lowering both their <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRolls">Attack Rolls</LSTag> by [1] per turn, and healing your wounds for [2] turns.
Absolute Consumption
Affected creature's abilities are being reduced by [1].
Survival Instinct
Infuse a creature with psionic force. If it reaches 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>, rather than dying, it will instead be left on the brink of death.
Survival Instinct
Affected creature is infused with psionic force. If this creature reaches 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>, rather than dying, it will instead be left on the brink of death.
Awakened
Your resistance to the zaith'isk in the githyanki infirmary has awakened newfound resilience. Illithid Powers no longer reduce your maximum <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> has been reduced by 2 by the Zaith'isk. The githyanki device failed to harm your illithid parasite, and has instead permanently taken something from you.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> has been reduced by 2 by the Zaith'isk. The githyanki device failed to harm your illithid parasite, and has instead permanently taken something from you.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> has been reduced by 2 by the Zaith'isk. The githyanki device failed to harm your illithid parasite, and has instead permanently taken something from you.
